meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Lithuania.
meanings.sent1: In Lithuania, you can buy many things with one mnas.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my euros for mnas when I visited Lithuania.
meanings.sent3: The mnas in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of mnas.
meanings.sent5: The shiny mnas sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: A suffix denoting a member of a group or class.
meanings.sent1: The scientist was known as a genius mnas among his peers.
meanings.sent2: She proudly wore the badge of honor that marked her as a royal mnas.
meanings.sent3: The little mnas always had a mischievous twinkle in his eye.
meanings.sent4: She was the queen of the dance floor, a true mnas of rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The brave knight was a shining mnas of valor in the kingdom.
